Representative_Docs: ['Janet Marie Flores Birth: 1931 Death: 2025 Janet Marie Flores passed away peacefully on November 21, 2025 at the age of 94 surrounded by the love of her family. She was kind, big hearted, extremely gracious and devoted to those she loved. Her presence will be deeply missed. Jan lived a long life traveling, playing golf, bunco with her friends and one of her greatest talents was to find a treasure at garage sales. In her final years she enjoyed playing penny slots at the casino. The last nine years Jan spent in the loving care of her daughter and son in law. A special thank you to her granddaughter Samantha for making her last days warm, comfortable and full of love. Jan survived by her daughter Tina Schilling (Michael), her grandchildren Michael (Marissa), Paul (Kacie), Samantha (Carlos), and her nine great grandchildren Jackson, Aubrey, Jordan, Mikey, Ellie, Luna, Ryder, Makayla and Stella.
